We as Easy Bursaries offer this platform for most comprehensive list of bursaries in South africa, and these bursaries are updated regularly. Our goal is to provide many bursary opportunities with accurate applying information, we do this to make it easier for students.If you are looking to start or continue your tertiary studies but lack the funding to do so, Easy bursaries could be the right option.
